descriptionNullable:
This dataset includes all the publicly available transcripts on the Today Explained podcast, which can be found on VOX's own website. Thus, all the credit should go to VOX as I only converted the transcripts into a CSV file.

 The dataset is suitable for studying, for example, conversations and news sentiment.
title: VOX - Today Explained (podcast) transcripts
subtitle: Large dataset of podcast transcripts
description:
This dataset includes all the publicly available transcripts on the Today Explained podcast, which can be found on VOX's own website. Thus, all the credit should go to VOX as I only converted the transcripts into a CSV file.

 The dataset is suitable for studying, for example, conversations and news sentiment.
